contents:
Speech Machine is our latest Unreal Engine plugin in development for sale on the Unreal Engine marketplace.
Speech Machine uses the latest in AI generated voices via the Azure Cognitive Services cloud platform to deliver high quality generative voice capabilities to Unreal Engine characters.
Our plugin offers the following features
 Text-to-speech Speech-to-text Localization Dialogue generation  Text to speech Allows us to take localized text, either from a spreadsheet or via an Unreal Engine asset and generate natural sounding voices in many different languages and with many different voices utiliting the AI powered voices of the Azure Cognitive services.
title: Speech Machine

contents:
We are currently developing a range of Machine Learning and Cloud enabled plug-in’s and tools for various game engines, such as Unreal Engine and Unity.
Speech Machine is an Unreal Engine plugin that uses Azure Cognitive Services to empower Unreal Engine games and applications with the power of speech, using text-to-speech and speech-to-text capabilities, along with powerful machine learning natural language understanding, you can create natural sounding responses to player/user inputs.
title: Speech Machine In Development
